hopobject.name: Swissbone
hopobject.body: I try to create a swissknife in a network. My bone delivers time white (NTP) over ethernet and different anthena (DCF77,GPS,3G-USB). i can deliver openvpn services, Wake on Command to start some server remotely. Samba Server,ftp,Apache,Tomcat,Nagios, Somme fonctionality soon..
hopobject.shortdesc: Swissbone is a swisskife. NTP server,Openvpn,wake one server,webinterface
